mapper.sql: ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, IMEI, USER_CNAME, REMARK, PROVINCE, USER_TYPE, END_TIME, CASE WHEN (END_TIME - NOW()) >= 0 THEN true ELSE false END as VIP
mapper.insert: insert into WZZ_USER (ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, IMEI, USER_CNAME, REMARK, PROVINCE, USER_TYPE, END_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update WZZ_USER
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMEI = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_CNAME = #{userCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
